title: Ticket #3251: Clean up /src/condor_examples
description:
/src/condor_examples/ has a bunch of underdocumented files of unclear purpose. We should clean it; removing stall entries, documenting useful stuff.

  • /src/condor_examples/condor_limits_wrapper.sh - Example USER_JOB_WRAPPER. Lack documentation; installed into libexec where it will likely be overlooked. Proposed: document it somewhere.
  • /src/condor_examples/master_wrapper - Wrapper for condor_master, probably part of CondorDroneRpm. Appears unused in "normal" installations. Does Condor Drone still exist? If not, probably kill this, along with /src/condor_scripts/native/SPECS/condor_drone.spec /src/condor_examples/condor.sysconfig.drone.patch and the line copying master_wrapper in /src/condor_scripts/make_native_packages.pl If we are still using it, it doesn't really seem like an "example," might it belong elsewhere, perhaps condor_scripts?
  • /src/condor_examples/generic_xml.yy /src/condor_examples/generic_xml.yacc - #618 - Doesn't appear to be installed or shipped. Proposed: needs documentation on usage somewhere. Also, if we're not shipping it, that suggests it's not really an example. Might it belong elsewhere?
creator: adesmet
